item.title: Release Notes
item.description: MobileOrg 1.7.4 Fixes BUG: iPhone 5 incompatibility #200 MobileOrg 1.7.3 Fixes BUG: Freezes occur on subsequent syncs over WebDAV #185 BUG: Outline badge is not removed immediately after syncing #187 BUG: Encryption password field is not initialised for Settings View, triggered by: #189 MobileOrg 1.7.2 New ENHANCEMENT: Split View Multitasking #168 Fixes BUG: Some Error Messages are much clearer now, triggered by: #169 BUG: Fixed an issue in settings where the complete user input was deleted if validation failed.
